Quests.title: Quests
Quests.subtitle: Send your gladiators on dangerous missions for glory and riches
Quests.generateQuestDescription: Generate a new quest for your gladiators. Each quest offers unique challenges, rewards, and risks.
Quests.rerollConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reroll this quest? A new quest will be generated.
Quests.cancelConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel this quest? It will cost 2 sestertii.
Quests.questAccepted: Quest accepted! The gladiator will return in 1 hour.
Quests.questOngoing: The gladiator is on their quest. Check back soon for results.
Quests.gladiatorFallenInBattle: The gladiator has fallen in battle.
Quests.noGladiators: You have no gladiators available for quests.
Quests.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds to perform this action.
Quests.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
